response.original_title: György Ligeti - All Clouds Are Clocks
response.overview: All Clouds are Clocks was made for the BBC’s long-running Omnibus arts strand, and is unique among all the films made for that series in being broadcast twice (in 1976 and 1991), with the second broadcast appending new footage to the original film.
response.title: György Ligeti - All Clouds Are Clocks
